mapper.insert: insert into book(bookid , bookname , image , cateid , price , recommend , hits , sellnum , contents ) values(#{bookid} , #{bookname} , #{image} , #{cateid} , #{price} , #{recommend} , #{hits}, #{sellnum} , #{contents} )
mapper.update: update book set bookname=#{bookname} , image=#{image} , cateid=#{cateid} , price=#{price} , recommend=#{recommend} , hits=#{hits} , sellnum=#{sellnum} , contents=#{contents} where bookid=#{bookid}
mapper.select: select a.* , b.catename from book a , cate b where 1=1 and a.cateid = b.cateid order by bookid desc
select a.* , b.catename from book a , cate b where a.cateid = b.cateid order by bookid desc limit 5
select a.* , b.catename from book a , cate b where a.cateid = b.cateid order by hits desc limit 5
select a.* , b.catename from book a , cate b where a.cateid = b.cateid and a.cateid=#{cateid} order by hits desc limit 5
select a.* , b.catename from book a , cate b where 1=1 and a.cateid = b.cateid and bookid=#{bookid} order by bookid desc
